oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Child Star of 'Hallelujah!' Is Killed"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; African Americans; newspapers; murders; Couch, Robert;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: News article describing the murder of Memphian Robert "Bones" Couch, who appeared in the film "Hallelujah!" as a child.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
